properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 15 at 1:45PM EST until January 17 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25
kt. Waves 1 to 2 ft expected. For the Gale Watch, northwest
winds 20 to 30 kt with possible gusts up to 35 kt. Waves around
2 ft.

* WHERE...Currituck Sound.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM to 6 PM EST
Thursday. For the Gale Watch, from Thursday evening through
late Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT
